summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 17721 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Utah Street, from the south margin of Connecticut Street to the north line of the canal waterway, and Hanford Street, from Utah Street to 1st Avenue South, by planking the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1068 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle" approved January 9, 1908.
